data.text: @UKCovid19Stats reinfection is still covid!!I’m sure if I got it again as badly then my attitude won’t be ‘oh it’s reinfection,that’s ok,it doesn’t count’The amount of people that have never had covid is falling, we are all likely to get reinfected,if we don’t count it,it  doesn’t mean it’s gone
@Nod641 @UKCovid19Stats 🤣🤣🤣🤣you should be on the stage with humour like that 😂

@PSmith1379 @UKCovid19Stats 30 followers to match your IQ.
Feel free to help out on a covid ward without any PPE though.
